pageContext.claim: “We haven't had an economy like this, I guess, in over 50 years.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often claims the U.S. economy is the best in the U.S. history, but here he keeps the claim to the last half century. But more jobs were created under Bill Clinton and Ronald Reagan, especially in percentage terms. Clinton had a 15.6 percentage increase in eight years and Reagan had a 16.5 percentage increase, while Trump has added about three percent in his first two years.
